blogPost.title: What should all women know about breast cancer risk? Answer by @KatePickert, Author of Radical: The Science, Culture and History of Breast Cancer in America. https://t.co/ediN5AFRiW https://t.co/fEyiVcswlZ
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 关于乳腺癌风险，所有女性都应该知道什么？回答者：@KatePickert，《激进：美国乳腺癌的科学、文化和历史》作者。https://t.co/ediN5AFRiW https://t.co/fEyiVcswlZ。
